title: Step 56

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .red CSS rule should have a background property set to linear-gradient(180deg, rgb(255, 0, 0) 0%, rgb(0, 255, 0) 50%, rgb(0, 0, 255) 100%).

description: Next, set the color-stop for red to 0%, the color-stop for green to 50%, and the color-stop for blue to 100%.
